channel.title: The perfect compiler
channel.description: I am working on the perfect compiler, it will be for clients and servers and it won't need to be reset each time you make a chnage to your server/client. All i need is to work out how to pause. This way i can have run server running and it will compile every 10 secs. Anyone got any ideas to help me with this?
